entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
